title: Hors d'oeuvres in the Court
description: Mike's three children were enticed to try a foreign food -- bacon-wrapped scallops -- by an offer from their father of $5. However, Mike now claims that since the boys enjoyed the food, he no longer owes them compensation. Mike's wife Ellen represents the boys in court.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
